message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality product at a competitive price.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $18000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to offer $12000 for the product. This is my best price, as I'm also considering other options.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $16000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $16000 is still a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $14000. This is my final offer, as I'm prepared to purchase from John if we can't reach an agreement.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal possible, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $15500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
